mode_emploi.paragraphe: In "Wordfire", the right answers have the astounding characteristic of catching fire !
The goal is to simultaneously set fire to the right answers in all the sentences on the display.
The trouble is, once a word is alight, the fire dies down progressively...
What's more : if you click on the wrong word, all the flames are blown off!
When you make a mistake, you have to start all over again... but the count down still goes on...
